markdown.author:
[Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)



# Opentrons has launched a new Protocol Library. This page won’t be available after March 31st, 2024. [Submit a request](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdYYp9QCKow4nn0KlCVsMS3HX0eJ0N9O7-erajKvcpT0lWbSg/viewform) to add this protocol to the new library.

---
markdown.description:
This protocol performs an AlphaLISA [Perkin Elmer AlphaLISA](https://resources.perkinelmer.com/lab-solutions/resources/docs/GDE_Quick_AlphaLISA_conversion.pdf) based on the attached experimental protocol with user determined parameters (described below).



---
markdown.labware:
* Opentrons Tips for P20 ([Standard](https://shop.opentrons.com/opentrons-300ul-tips-1000-refills/))
* 96-Well Low-Binding Corning Costar Microplate 3363
* 384-Well Perkin Elmer OptiPlate ([Example](https://shop.opentrons.com/nest-0-1-ml-96-well-pcr-plate-full-skirt/))
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
markdown.process:
1. Input your protocol parameters using the parameters section on this page, then download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol file (.py extension) to the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app) in the `Protocol` tab.
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
5. Hit 'Run'.
markdown.protocol-steps:
1. Use the p20 multi to transfer 8 uL sample serial dilution from slot 3 A1-A12 to slot 1 A1-A12.
2. Use the p20 multi to transfer 8 uL sample serial dilution from slot 3 A1-A12 to slot 1 B1-B12.
3. Use the p20 multi to transfer 8 uL sample serial dilution from slot 3 A1-A12 to slot 1 A13-A24.
4. Use the p20 multi to transfer 8 uL sample serial dilution from slot 3 A1-A12 to slot 1 B13-B24.
5. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL ligand 1 from slot 5 A1 to slot 1 A1-A24, then B1-B24. Similarly, use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL ligand 2 to the plate in slot 2.
6. Pause and wait for user to resume.
7. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL anti-ligand from slot 6 A1 to slot 1 A1-A24.
8. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL anti-ligand from slot 6 A1 to slot 1 B1-B24.
9. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL anti-ligand from slot 6 A2 to slot 2 A1-A24.
10. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL anti-ligand from slot 6 A2 to slot 2 B1-B24.
11. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL acceptor from slot 6 A3 to slot 1 A1-A24.
12. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL acceptor from slot 6 A3 to slot 1 B1-B24.
13. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL acceptor from slot 6 A4 to slot 2 A1-A24.
14. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL acceptor from slot 6 A4 to slot 2 B1-B24.
15. Pause and wait for user to resume.
16. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL donor from slot 6 A5 to slot 1 A1-A24.
17. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL donor from slot 6 A5 to slot 1 B1-B24.
18. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL donor from slot 6 A6 to slot 2 A1-A24.
19. Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL donor from slot 6 A6 to slot 2 B1-B24.
markdown.title: AlphaLISA

notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.
process:
Input your protocol parameters using the parameters section on this page, then download your protocol.
Upload your protocol file (.py extension) to the OT App in the Protocol tab.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit 'Run'.
protocol-steps:
Use the p20 multi to transfer 8 uL sample serial dilution from slot 3 A1-A12 to slot 1 A1-A12.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 8 uL sample serial dilution from slot 3 A1-A12 to slot 1 B1-B12.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 8 uL sample serial dilution from slot 3 A1-A12 to slot 1 A13-A24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 8 uL sample serial dilution from slot 3 A1-A12 to slot 1 B13-B24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL ligand 1 from slot 5 A1 to slot 1 A1-A24, then B1-B24. Similarly, use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL ligand 2 to the plate in slot 2.
Pause and wait for user to resume.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL anti-ligand from slot 6 A1 to slot 1 A1-A24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL anti-ligand from slot 6 A1 to slot 1 B1-B24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL anti-ligand from slot 6 A2 to slot 2 A1-A24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL anti-ligand from slot 6 A2 to slot 2 B1-B24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL acceptor from slot 6 A3 to slot 1 A1-A24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL acceptor from slot 6 A3 to slot 1 B1-B24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL acceptor from slot 6 A4 to slot 2 A1-A24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL acceptor from slot 6 A4 to slot 2 B1-B24.
Pause and wait for user to resume.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL donor from slot 6 A5 to slot 1 A1-A24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL donor from slot 6 A5 to slot 1 B1-B24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL donor from slot 6 A6 to slot 2 A1-A24.
Use the p20 multi to transfer 4 uL donor from slot 6 A6 to slot 2 B1-B24.
title: AlphaLISA
